name: Cannon Conquest (ALL UNLOCKS)
description:
This is the full version of Cannon Conquest.
It contains no ads or in-app products. All levels and worlds can be unlocked and the multiplayer is included.

-------------------------------------

Cannon Conquest is a challenging 2D Puzzle shooter.
Try to assimilate all enemy cannons and defending your own cannons.

Highlights:

* Four different worlds with different elements and in total over 100 levels

* Optional local multiplayer over bluetooth

* 4 difficulties per level

* Online highscore and account system

* Six different tower types and many other gameplay variations

* And extremely challenging fourth difficulty

* No ads, all levels are unlockable by skill alone

Permissions:

Internet: For Online Highscore and account synchronization
Bluetooth: For local multiplayer
Location: For whatever reasons bluetooth needs location permissions...
